sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.resources

Interface ResourceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Nameable, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceService

    public interface ResourceService
extends Service
    An object with an operational state providing access to the underlying resource provider and manager. Resource service also has asynchronous lifecycle methods to transition between states. Resource provider and manager encapsulated by this service are only accessible while the service is running.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  ResourceService.Builder
      A builder for creating resource service instances.

      • equals

        boolean equals(@Nullable
             java.lang.Object o)
        Compares the specified object with this service for equality. Returns true if the specified object is also service and the two services have the same name. This definition ensures that this method works properly across different implementations of the service interface.
